name: Errante (itch)
description:
Is there a destination for those who have nothing to cling on?

Take a short ride into the mind and steps of a lone struggling traveler in a dusty and sterile world.

Errante is a 5 days experimental mood-piece and contains no "gameplay".

  • The experience is roughly 15 minutes long and should be finished in a single sitting play session;
  • Standard WASD + Mouse controls;
  • We recommend to turn the lights-out and the use of headphones for better enjoyment;
  • All files are 64-bit.

Please support us by buying the game at suggested or higher price. That will help us a lot with our bigger projects in development. :)
